newsitem.title: USA: U.S. spot crude oil trades - May 13 1535 EDT.
newsitem.headline: U.S. spot crude oil trades - May 13 1535 EDT.

text.p: May 13 - Light Louisiana Sweet/St. James at West Texas Intermediate/Cushing +11/13/10/14 cents. Heavy Louisiana Sweet/Empire -25 cents. West Texas Sour/Midland -$1.38/1.34. WTI/Cushing Postings Plus $2.06/2.07.
May 12 - Light Louisiana Sweet/St. James at West Texas Intermediate/Cushing +9/10/11/12 cents. West Texas Sour/Midland -$1.44/1.45. WTI/Cushing Postings Plus $2.16/2.12.

May 9 - West Texas Intermediate/Midland at West Texas Intermediate -30/31 cents. Light Louisiana Sweet/St. James +7/8 cents. Heavy Louisiana Sweet/Empire -32 cents. West Texas Sour/Midland -$1.49/1.50/1.47. WTI/Cushing Postings Plus $2.00/2.01/2.02/2.03/2.04/2.05/2.06/2.07.

May 8 - West Texas Intermediate/Midland at West Texas Intermediate/Cushing -30 cents. Light Louisiana Sweet/St. James +3 cents. Heavy Louisiana Sweet/Empire -40 cents. West Texas Sour/Midland -$1.60. WTI/Cushing Postings Plus $1.90.

May 7 - Light Louisiana Sweet/St. James at WTI +8 cents, Heavy Louisiana Sweet/Empire at WTI -35 cents/-38 cents, West Texas Sour/Midland at WTI -$1.55, Eugene Island at WTI -$1.40/-$1.30, WTI/Cushing Postings-plus $1.85.

May 6 - West Texas Intermediate/Midland at West Texas Intermediate/Cushing -31 cents. Light Louisiana Sweet/St.James 0/+1/2/3/4 cts. Heavy Louisiana Sweet/Empire -40 cents. West Texas Sour/Midland -$1.60/1.65/1.68/1.70. Eugene Island -$1.45. WTI/Cushing Posting Plus $1.82.
May 2 - LLS/St. James -7/2/3/1/0. WTS/Midland -$1.80. Eugene Island -$1.50.
May 1 - WTI/Midland -31. LLS/St. James -7/8. HLS/Empire -50. WTS/Midland -$1.75. Eugene -$1.55. WTI/Cushing p+ $1.82.
Apr 29 - WTI/Midland -29 cents. LLS/St. James even/+3/-5/-8 cts. HLS/Empire -45/50 cts. WTS/Midland -$1.70/1.68/1.65. Eugene Island -$1.55. WTI/Cushing p+ $1.87/1.82/1.85/1.91.
Apr 28 - WTI/Midland -27 cents. LLS/St. James evens/+1/2/4. HLS/Empire -55 cts. Eugene -$1.65/1.55. WTI/Cushing p+ $1.83.
